title: Smart Data Models - ExcAC6A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE AC6A alternator-supplied rectifier excitation system with speed input.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcAC6A

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 536. Default: 0.0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc).  Typical Value = 0.173. Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Demagnetizing factor, a function of exciter alternator reactances (Kd).  Typical Value = 1.91. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke).  Typical Value = 1.6. Default: 0.0

kh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current limiter gain (Kh).  Typical Value = 92. Default: 0.0

ks.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

seve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve1, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve1]).  Typical Value = 0.214. Default: 0.0

seve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve2, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve2]).  Typical Value = 0.044. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.086. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 9. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

th.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current limiter time constant (Th).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0

tj.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current limiter time constant (Tj).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

tk.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tk).  Typical Value = 0.18. Default: 0

vamax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (Vamax).  Typical Value = 75. Default: 0.0

vamin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (Vamin).  Typical Value = -75. Default: 0.0

ve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve).  Typical Value = 7.4. Default: 0.0

ve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve2).  Typical Value = 5.55. Default: 0.0

vfelim.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current limit reference (Vfelim).  Typical Value = 19. Default: 0.0

vhmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum field current limiter signal reference (Vhmax).  Typical Value = 75. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 44. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -36. Default: 0.0
